item.title: Need help with making a command!
item.dc:creator: @SnowStar SnowStar
item.description:
@SnowStar wrote:

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:9, topic:463468”]http://prntscr.com/h0lg8
Nice 1 Error Left xD

FIXED! EDITED THE c2 To C

THANK YOU BUDDY![/quote]
c.sendMessage only sends it to yourself, not the whole server. Use this code, it works, I promise!

if (playerCommand.equals("active") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2683, 3725, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Thanks for Helping the Players!"); c2.sendMessage("The player "+c.playerName+" has just teleported to the helpzone!"); }

Sorry it took so long, it’s currently 5:20am so I am tired!

Read full topic

@SnowStar wrote:

Copy this and paste it exactly how it is:

if (playerCommand.equals("active") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2683, 3725, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Thanks for Helping the Players!"); c2.sendMessage(c.playerName+" has teleported to the helpzone!"); }

I just tried it on my server, it worked perfectly fine.

@SnowStar wrote:

} if (playerCommand.equals("active") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2683, 3725, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Thanks for Helping the Players!"); c2.sendMessage(c.playerName+" has teleported to the helpzone!"); }

item.source: Need help with making a command!

item.title: Need help with making a command!
item.dc:creator: @SnowStar SnowStar
item.description:
@SnowStar wrote:

I’m assuming, when a player teleports to the help-zone you want to announce it to the whole server, right? Well, copy your ‘active’ command but change the name, like so;

if (playerCommand.equals("helpzone") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2683, 3725, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Thanks for Helping the Players!"); c.sendMessageToAll("<img=1>c.playerName+" has teleported to the helpzone!");

That should work! All you did was copy a previous command. Let me know if it doesn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with making a command!
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Well i got a PI Source [Torvapkz]i need help with making a help zone command.

I already Got helpzone :} if (playerCommand.equals("helpzone") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2683, 3725, 0, "modern"); //The Coords just random c.sendMessage("You teleported to the Helpzone.");

I want a command what is sending to all players a message when it got used(Like that)

if (playerCommand.equals("active") && (c.playerRights >= 1)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2683, 3725, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Thanks for Helping the Players!"); c.sendMessageToAll("<img=1>c.playerName+" is Active at Helpzone!");

Any 1 Could make me a code that WORKS like this? Please? Im trying this like 2 months to create a code like that.
Help Would be really appreciated ! Thanks

Read full topic
